definition: the organ in women and female animals in which babies or young animals develop before they are born

the central feature of something or the main source of its strength
strength of character

an early type of musical instrument with strings, played like a guitar
a musical instrument like a guitar with a body in the shape of a triangle and two, three, or four strings, popular especially in Russia
